statements: SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'phone';
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM connected_devices WHERE owner_id = '12345';
SELECT device_type, access_level FROM connected_devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT device_name FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'laptop' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE access_level = 'admin' AND device_status = 'inactive';
SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE device_status = 'inactive' ORDER BY device_type ASC, device_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_id FROM connected_devices WHERE access_level = 'admin' OR access_level = 'super_admin';
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM connected_devices GROUP BY owner_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_devices DESC;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_owner FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT device_name, device_owner, role FROM connected_devices JOIN access_control ON connected_devices.id = access_control.device_id;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'smartphone';
SELECT device_name, device_owner FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_owner DESC;
SELECT c.device_name, a.role FROM connected_devices c JOIN access_control a ON c.id = a.device_id WHERE a.access_type = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE device_owner LIKE '%John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM connected_devices;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_description FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_description FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT device_name, r.role_name FROM connected_devices d JOIN device_roles dr ON d.device_id = dr.device_id JOIN roles r ON dr.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_description FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Laptop' AND device_id < 100;
SELECT device_id, device_name, role_name FROM connected_devices JOIN device_roles ON connected_devices.device_id = device_roles.device_id JOIN roles ON device_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT device_name, device_description FROM connected_devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT device_id, device_name, user_id FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, dr.role_name FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN device_roles dr ON d.user_id = dr.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT d.device_name, dr.role_name FROM devices d JOIN device_roles dr ON d.user_id = dr.role_id;
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, dr.role_name FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN device_roles dr ON d.user_id = dr.role_id WHERE u.role='admin';
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM connected_devices;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_id, role_id FROM device_roles WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT d.device_name, r.role_name FROM connected_devices d JOIN device_roles dr ON d.device_id = dr.device_id JOIN roles r ON dr.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN device_roles dr ON ur.user_id = dr.device_id JOIN connected_devices d ON dr.device_id = d.device_id;
